website_summaries.verdict: Great price point, as you receive two collars for one low cost.
pros: Two-pack of dog flea collars that are each rated to provide six months of protection
Will fit any size of dog or puppy
Provides protection against mosquitoes as well as ticks and fleas
Collar continues to work when wet
cons: Some dogs have sensitivity to these collars
Probably won't last the full six months

customer_reviews.title: IF SATAN'S TOUCH CAME IN A FLEA COLLAR!!
customer_reviews.text: Never ever ever use this on your animal!!! Would be no stars or negative if possible. My poor puppy has chemical burns!!! They're all the way around his neck but the base is the worst. Contacted Amazon to have this product removed permanently. To hell with Adams!
customer_reviews.author: E. Malcom

customer_reviews.title: Seems as Good as Seresto but Costs Less
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as good as the Seresto brand that I used before. I have 2 small dogs that stay outside for the most part. They will have fleas and ticks if untreated. Like Seresto, this product takes time for the medication to build up in the dog's skin. During that time, your dog may experience an allergic reaction to the medication. If that happens, do not do like another reviewer on here. Take the collar off. Not all dogs are allergic, but some are. If you have fleas and ticks on the dog, use something to eliminate that infestation first. Like, this product seems to be best at keeping fleas and ticks away.
customer_reviews.author: jp2code

customer_reviews.title: Works better than the expensive brand!
customer_reviews.text: Last year we tried the more expensive brand. It worked fairly well, but not perfectly. This year we tried this one. There are a lot of ticks outside, but they are more likely to come in on my clothes than on my dogs -- and if there is a tick on one of the dogs, I have yet to find one that's attached itself to the dog. These collars are easy to put on, and they stay on well. The dog's skin isn't irritated. Both dogs are happy and healthy and our house is flea and tick free.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars changed to Five!
customer_reviews.text: The collars (I'm using the 2 collars on 2 🐶) barely lasted a month! Updated: Because the smell wasn't noticeable I thought the collar wasn't working, but that's Not the case! Both my dogs are still wearing them and have had minimal itching so rating has been adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Doemak3y

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used a more expensive collar last year for my 70lb Australian Shepherd Blue Heeler mix, and this one works even better. He has very thick fur, so the liquid flea and tick treatment doesn't work well. Ticks have been absolutely terrible this year (2017, Ohio) and he has had very few ticks on him and no fleas whatsoever. My dog and I are pleased with this product! UPDATE: I'm buying this for the 3rd time. I have used four of these collars and he has always done well with them, no ticks or fleas, no skin issues, or anything.
customer_reviews.author: E. White

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I live in a area where the ticks ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I live in a area where the ticks are bad already! Just found 2 dead ones on my dog. So glad I bought these, rather then the expensive ones! Thanx so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6weeks not 6months!
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to work well at first. It claims 6months but was more like 6weeks :( my GSD was bitten by some fleas for the 1st time and he has a severe flea allergy that is just awful for him and us. My shih Tzu was ok until I shaved her and this was actually touching her skin. She displayed symptoms that I thought may be neurological or ear infection we treated all those things and after I put the collar back on the symptoms returned a few days later so I took it back off. She is doing well now. I can't be sure the collar is causing it but I won't use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Problems! Would never recommend and will NEVER purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell the product is effective; however, it made all 4 of my dogs itch continuously around their neck. I even took the collars off for a few days, the itching stopped. When I put them back on the itching resumed. Now I have purchased 4 collars and my time to return has expired! We had previously used Seresto and had no problem. I tried Adams because it was less expensive. I guess you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste H

customer_reviews.title: neurological poisoning
customer_reviews.text: 3 of my 4 dogs reacted to these - my beagle got a severe reaction to his ears/balance which has him shaking his head for 2 days now - my little ones are both jerking around with some kind of neurological issues, like they can't control their movements - will NEVER purchase this brand ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Pervin

customer_reviews.title: A solid product
customer_reviews.text: These are nice collars, they work well and as advertised. However, they clasp is awful. The collars don't stay on. I have had to zip-tie them closed. but they leave a pleasant smell and don't interfere with the other collar on the dogs. I will consider getting them again, and hope they have a better clasp.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Alley

customer_reviews.title: No fleas, no ticks, no chemical burns
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for three years now on my two Golden Retrievers. I always wash them off as soon as I get them to rinse off any excess chemicals. I think that may be what causes them to burn some dogs? They usually have a chalky texture to them at first but turn to smooth rubber after washing and wearing for a while. I have never had an issue with fleas or ticks since using these and our house backs up to woods and a drainage corridor. I do also treat my yard every year and don't let the dogs run into the woods, so that limits their exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Santoro

customer_reviews.title: Poisoned both of my dogs...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT.... I repeat DO NOT purchase those product if you have more than one dog in your house... these collars are extremely poorly made and have no reliable way to keep them on while your dogs are at play. Not to mention it doesn’t take much to just rare. My one dog ripped it off my other’s neck and they ate the collar before I could realize it was gone... now I find myself on the way to the emergency vet with two dogs poisoned and experiencing seizures... buy a better quality brand that will actually fasten together or don’t buy collars at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nrohjay

customer_reviews.title: Good for large dogs, not for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs - a 60 lb mutt and a 7 lb yorkie. This worked fine on the larger dog, but caused major irritation to the small dog (her fur rubbed off and her neck was inflamed after a day and a half of use). The material is very cheap and looks like it won't hold up the full time (looks like rubber that has been exposed to elements over a period of time and will just fall apart). It states it's a 12 month protection, but each collar is 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: DeniLav

customer_reviews.title: Works with a pleasant fragrance amazingly!
customer_reviews.text: No insects on her at all and makes her smell like a vanilla ice cream cone :-) lol
customer_reviews.author: Pete 2Z

customer_reviews.title: I like these collars
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Seresto collars in the past but now with two large dogs, all of my funds go more to their food lol. I like these collars. They work just as well as the more expensive brand. They have gotten them wet and still no problems. The only draw back was the fastener. My pups tend to play rough and one always falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consider that you won't know for a while if the product is effective.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if the product works. Our dog did not stop scratching and we had the vet examine her for possible other causes. There weren't any. It would be unfair for me to say this product is worthless - it may work on some dogs. If you are contemplating purchasing this product, you should consider that by the time you'll have an idea if it provides any benefit, the return option will have expired. I would return it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use flea treatment.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and worked great. We brought home a rescue puppy and he came with fleas. However these collars kept the fleas from getting from my other 3 dogs. I would definitely buy again. It was easy to apply and much easier than the liquids to the back of the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Steven  Brunell

customer_reviews.title: Working great for a few weeks. Time will tell!
customer_reviews.text: They stopped selling the other inexpensive brand I bought, so I tried this which has the same active ingredient. First two weeks were bad with live ticks after every walk in the woods. After two full weeks I pulled one or two dead ticks off and we've been tick free for a few weeks. I hope to get 4-5 months out of this. If not I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: jmkccTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So far working I think
customer_reviews.text: Have had on the dogs for about two week. I have noticed some dead fleas coming off them. It smells like vanilla so it is a bit strange. But seems to be working Stopped working after a couple of weeks very disappointing. Quit Had to go back to topical treatments.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: It was too strong for our Chorkie.
customer_reviews.text: This collar looked perfect on the surface, until the next day when our Chorkie started acting weird. His legs jerked and he was restless. He couldn’t get comfortable. By the evening he was miserable and finally the collar started making a little redness on his neck. We removed it. By the next morning his neck was blistered and burned but his nerve problems were better. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Product sux created rashes for my pups!!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are straight boo boo. I bought these for my adult female chihuahua and my pitbull puppy. Within 2 days both had rashes. Stick to normal flea collars because these things are no good for your animals. The goal is to help your dogs comfort not torcher them smh. Glad I caught it in time before it did anymore damage to my poor pups. Real talk turn around dont but this product.
customer_reviews.author: AplusCmusick

customer_reviews.title: Dog flea collars
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why these will not stay on the dogs. One is a husky and the other is a retriever, terrier mix and both of these dogs had these collars off within days. Then by the time I found them, I put them on again and they were off again. They have these little tabs on them to help keep them tight but they need a clamp or something else. Both are off of the dogs again. Will have to try a different type of collar ...sorry, not working. My dogs are medium size dogs weighing 50 and 56 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Perez

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!  HAZARDOUS!!! CAUSED CHEMICAL BURN ON MY CHIHUAHUA
customer_reviews.text: My little Chihuahua had this collar on her for about a week and developed this sore/burn. Appears to be a chemical type burn caused by this collar. I have never in my life had an issue such as this occurring as a result of the use of an over the counter flea collar. Will be sending this back. Saw another post of a similar occurrence..this is not good!
customer_reviews.author: S. Mercado

customer_reviews.title: My dog is happy
customer_reviews.text: Fleas don't like urine and during "the process" they jump to my Jack Russell Terrier's belly and legs. This is the nature. Sometimes they "bite" immediately but because of the collar the flea disappears. Several occasions I removed my dog's collar and thats it, she can't sleep properly. First 5 days the collar stinks a strong chemical scent but, after 5- 7 days vanishes and the collar maintains his functions.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando AU

customer_reviews.title: This product is not safe and causes severe reactions
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy or put this on your animals. Our dog was poisoned and suffered neurological problems as a result. This is not a safe product. But your flea and tick prevention from the veterinarian. We have learned the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Simons

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you fit it right before you trim it.
customer_reviews.text: When you trim this leave some room for growth. My husky had no issue with it, but my Pointer's neck got a little thicker over two months. Backstory: he's a recent rescue and was a little thin, he's also an aggressive chewer (hense the rescue). My pointer got the collar off overnight and well, he'd shred it to pieces. Luckily he didnt actually consume it and was fine, but definitely a lesson well-learned. Tbh wished it had a more secure way to latch
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Conter

customer_reviews.title: My pup had a scary reaction. - DON’T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Please please please don’t buy this for your pup. Mine has been having muscle spasms and itching for DAYS. I took him to the vet to make sure he’s okay. She said he had a NERVOUS SYSTEM reaction to this collar. Not an allergic on specific to my dog. He’ll be fine only because I took it off soon enough. Thank goodness he’s okay. My vet said she has seen this in many other pups from using this specific brand.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: So far i think it is working to keep dog tick free without all the pestisides of topical remedies
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are working the price was good but i did have a few ticks but they seem to be dead or dying so unsure i have been also spraying dog with essential oil spray to help when she goes in tall grass as way to repel ticks from even climbing on , time will be the test i hate putting all those pesticides on dog with side effects which you cant control , trying this now and seems to work dont want ticks on me , my dog, or in my home >
customer_reviews.author: frances delossantos

customer_reviews.title: No fleas or ticks for 3+ years
customer_reviews.text: These are good for our dogs with sensitive skin. They work all summer long in the Oklahoma country and our dogs have never had a flea or tick on them while we have been using these collars.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Jones

customer_reviews.title: I recommend, even for dogs with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: By far the most effective and cost efficient flea/tick collar I’ve ever purchased. My rough and tumble large dogs snap or lose other brand collars, but this design stays in place and comfortable for the dogs. My dogs don’t suffer hot spots or irritation like previous brands. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wells

customer_reviews.title: Did not work. Bought these to try since Seresto ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Bought these to try since Seresto decided to jack the price of their collars up. I have 5 inside dogs, that did not have fleas before I put the collars on. 3 days after I put the collars on all 5 were digging and scratching at the collars. I thought maybe they were having a reaction to the collars. I took them off and all 5 dogs had fleas. Even directly under the collars there were fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Works Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I live in the country with dear and other wildlife all around. Within a week no fleas or tics on dogs and by the end of two weeks NO FLEAS/TICKS in the House. WOW This is the best, most reliable flea collar I have found and I have tried all of the stuff that is not OVER PRICED. These (2 per pkg) are very reasonably priced. Thank you Adams.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gentile

customer_reviews.title: Better than what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This works well. My one dog did get a rash on her neck but I put i on top of her regular collar & works like a charm. Excellent value! Used the seresto Brand prior but it is so expensive, This item is comparable for pennies! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Lutton

customer_reviews.title: These do not work
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my dogs. The fleas were still on them both. So I waited one, then tow and three. These collars are worthless. Both my dogs still have many fleas. They took my money and left the fleas. I am sorry I had to give at least one star. BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FLEA INFESTATION!
customer_reviews.text: First time ever I had to deal with fleas! I have always used the application to the skin, ie Frontline or K-9 advantage. I don't know what possessed me to try a collar last year but I will never again. It took us weeks to rid our home and poor little Lhasapoo of her fleas!
customer_reviews.author: Storksaid

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE. CHEMICAL BURNS.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE!!! Gave both my dogs red rash, they scratched at it and one day whined from the chemical burn pain. We cut them off and saw huge red rashes, we washed with Dawn soap as gently as we could. Then we put some local dog balm on both to calm the irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I have not noticed a bit of a difference with my dogs at all. To be honest I was fairly skeptical in ordering this anyways because I just don’t see how these things could possibly work, just pointless.
customer_reviews.author: nolla_.

customer_reviews.title: my essential oils do a better job of him not scratching
customer_reviews.text: Our dog kept getting the collar off... and even when on it only lasteed a month before biting and scratching resumed...my essential oils do a better job of him not scratching... but I can’t see any results ofactually killing off regardless of collar or not... bought 2 of these 2 packs...what a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Reinhard

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these! They broke my poor babies necks out! My older puppy turned into mommy mode and immediately started licking thier sores. So now my older puppy is sick. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Best collar I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck here. This collar has worked better than any expensive one that I've used. It's been on the dog for 5 months now and still working very well. Having 2 in the package is great.
customer_reviews.author: windysoles

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE,
customer_reviews.text: These collars are garbage, they don't work and now I am fighting with fleas. I Have used Seresto for the past 4 years and because of finances I decided to try these collars. I used adams products when I lived in Florida and it was great. So I thought why not. Fleas are WHY NOT. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Collar Doesn’t Stay On
customer_reviews.text: Both of our dogs were able to remove the collar within 1-2 days. Can’t work if it won’t stay on. They’ve never removed a collar before. One dog is 50+lbs and the other is about 20.
customer_reviews.author: KayDee

customer_reviews.title: This poor dog didn't deserve this
customer_reviews.text: After less than one week of wearing this flea collar i noticed this rash in my dogs neck and he had a open sore. Just sent a message asking for a refund. This poor dog didn't deserve this. This item can’t be returned since it requires special transportation and handling which we can’t provide. Use the Contact us button for help addressing your issue.
customer_reviews.author: Aimeeintx

customer_reviews.title: Latch Needs Work
customer_reviews.text: My dogs lost a couple due to poor latch design. Took a leather hole punch and punched holes in collar then placed on dogs and ran a small cable tie through holes - seems to work great now. Have not found any fleas or ticks on them after several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Works well... like really well!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area that's has ticks that are hard to get rid of. Every year my poor dogs have been miserable as we have tried nearly everything to get ahead of tick season and fight the long battle. So far we have only seen 2 ticks that were small and unattached. This was a great investment for all my babies big and small!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: The notches on the collar makes it impossible to not fit any size dog
customer_reviews.text: I like the design because it is so adjustable that it fits my small dog perfectly. The notches on the collar is brilliant. Makes sizing so easy for really small dogs. Love the container it is packaged in. Keeps the product airtight so the collar doesnt loose its potentcy.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Laveglia

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these and they have done nothing. It was a waste of money. Yes i did treat everything and i waited and watched for 3 weeks but nothing. Will not buy agian
customer_reviews.author: bunnie

customer_reviews.title: No collars!
customer_reviews.text: I think I will stick with a cream or oil of medication for my dog. The collars are overly powerful smelling and seem to be to flimsy and flexible. i had a hard time keeping it on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These collars work
customer_reviews.text: Flee collar works very well keeping fleas and ticks off our Airedale’s and misquotes as well. Only thing you have to do is use small zip ties to hold the collar together once on the dogs. Without the zip ties they lose the collars in hours. The last set we bought lasted 2 years and still no tics on the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flea and tick collar, no fleas or ticks at all.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent flea and tick collar, my dogs did not get fleas once all summer. Very economical and no harsh residue on their skin or coats. I have two dogs so one package really saved me a lot of money. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Pond

customer_reviews.title: Put it on top of their regular collar.
customer_reviews.text: I love these collars. My pup has no fleas or ticks. I don't put the collar directly around his neck, I put it around his regular collar. I'm impressed considering it isn't that expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Princessghosty

customer_reviews.title: The Flea and Tick Collars do not work
customer_reviews.text: The collars do not work. We used them on our big dogs and puppies. The puppies have more fleas and ticks than before putting the collars on them. The collars are still on them. The big dogs wore them for a day and then the collars were no longer on them the next day. The collars do not stay snug once you have the correct length. They keep sliding off. My money for 6 collars went down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R.

customer_reviews.title: Flea collar
customer_reviews.text: I got this item for my dogs. Price was right, but item does not work. My dogs are still scatching like crazy and I am still combing fleas out on a daily. My dog keeps getting it off. I am not pleased with this order and do not recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nilda Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get rid of fleas very well UGH!
customer_reviews.text: My dog still gets fleas even when it is a new collar?! Don't understand why since we also used the shampoo from this brand as well. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Won't Stay On!
customer_reviews.text: Fastening mechanism is poorly designed and insufficient. Both collars didn't even make the day on either of my dogs! Lost, Gone.... Waste of money. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: We have three different types of dogs and these collars work well on them all. It takes about 1 to 2 weeks to notice that the fleas are gone completely. But here we are months later and still bug free. Well worth the price. No adverse effects. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Does not work against fleas!!
customer_reviews.text: purchased these for our dogs thinking it would be nice not to have to put chemicals on the back of their necks each month. Did not work at all!!! horrible flea infestation within a month of putting on dogs with no fleas ever noticed etc. Have had to double bomb the house, dip the dogs, wash sweep and mop over and over. Would not recommend or purchase period.
customer_reviews.author: quilt lover

customer_reviews.title: My dog developed a rash
customer_reviews.text: Sad to say, my dog developed a really bad rash after wearing this for only a few days. She is a small dog, and has very thin fur around her neck, so maybe that is why. Either way I had to remove the collar and am not able to use this on her. Hopefully others have had better success with this product.
customer_reviews.author: L.Z.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very bad item
customer_reviews.text: Omg this collar almost killed my dog. I put it on him and within 24 hours my dog started to act so weird like he was having a seizure called vet and vet said to take off immediately and bathe him. I had done that before I called. My poor pup had his neck all bloody rash and was in pain. Heads up vet said never buy anything for our animals online. You never know what your really buying.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Highly Allergic
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a great alternative to the Seresto collars (price wise) but my dogs were highly allergic to this product. Within 24hrs, my dogs lost hair and started getting sores from the collar. Will be purchasing Seresto again since they didn’t have an adverse reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Ebtrixie

customer_reviews.title: No more ticks!
customer_reviews.text: This has been very helpful for our dog! We live in the country and he use to get ticks a lot, but not since this!
customer_reviews.author: Fae

customer_reviews.title: Bad, bad, bad - so far
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been terrible! I will change my review later, if I need to. We put the collar on about 24 hours ago and our Mini Daschund has been itching and scratching since. Prior to the collar, it was periodically, but now it is constant. We will watch it another day or two then either take it off or come back on here and change our review.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t kill or repel fleas
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely did not work at all and my dog developed a horrible bumpy rash around his neck to the top of his head
customer_reviews.author: Rose Blacker

customer_reviews.title: These work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick, these work great at keeping fleas and ticks off my 4 English Springer Spaniels.
customer_reviews.author: cuddly1958

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this every year for my dog... so far I haven't seen a flea or tic! Mosquitoes tend to leave her alone too!
customer_reviews.author: C. Birch

customer_reviews.title: Helped a littlw
customer_reviews.text: These worked ok. They didn’t fully get rid of the fleas on our dogs, but they helped a little.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but not 100%
customer_reviews.text: Helped to keep biting insects off the dog but she still got bit on her legs and paws
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 successful
customer_reviews.text: The first round work for approximately 5 months. Replacement was the same and dogs were scratching about 3 weeks after the change out.
customer_reviews.author: Moremotivation

customer_reviews.title: i'd buy this again
customer_reviews.text: they were pretty good but our puppies chewed them off each other within 2 days of having them on -.-
customer_reviews.author: Pao Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Product is dangerous to dogs!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog was whining repeatedly a few days after I put the collar on her I check her body to see if shes hurt and I realized these flea collar left one my dogs with AWFUL open sore and my other dog with a large bald spot!!! DO NOT PURCHASE!! OBVIOUSLY THIS PRODUCT IS POORLY MADE!! My dogs have worn flea collars before and this has NEVER happened!!!
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: did not work. used with adams brand shampoo and topical.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Bad Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: My poor dog got a really bad skin reaction on her neck to the meds in this collar and ended up on multiple meds and a cone collar. This collar cost me over $200 in vet bills.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Sally

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: This flea collar really works, I have bought it twice, comes with 2, last 6 months each. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: diane M.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied owner and hurt dog
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work, my dog was fine going into summer we expect a higher concentration of bugs and decided to go with these collars it's been almost 2 months (maintaining the yard and her sleeping area). Would not recommend or buy again, I have a second order I would like to return/get refunded
customer_reviews.author: Sally Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Read before you but
customer_reviews.text: Turned my girls neck red & one ended up with a raw stop
customer_reviews.author: Denise F

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't seem to work my dog continued to scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Melaney

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the dogs.  Bad for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my four dogs. It was misery. I was terribly allergic and ended up throwing them away. I tried to cope but could not.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: Item was not productive.
customer_reviews.text: It did not work. It was returned via UPS on June 17, 2020 and it got to the necessary location June 19, 2020. Tracking number 1Z6V51Y29062102625
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it works my dog is scratching but it’s also spring. Another year for fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: This came highly recommended but didn't work at all. Dogs still got fleas and had to do a flea dip to get rid of them. My biggest dog scratched her collar off by breaking it after 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Product didnt do its job
customer_reviews.text: Didnt do its job my poor little dog still got fleas didnt work
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hartford

customer_reviews.title: BYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT RECOMMEND GAVE BOTH OF MY DOGS RASHES AND MADE THEM VERY ITCHY
customer_reviews.author: Taura Laughton

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The thickness of the collar is great because it’s thin and doesn’t effect my dog at all!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Try a different brand
customer_reviews.text: dogs kept slipping the collars off and did nothing for the flea prevention.
customer_reviews.author: Marie S.

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Got these a cheaper alternative to the Bayer and that was a mistake. Get the expensive Bayer ones. Those are incredible.
customer_reviews.author: David White

customer_reviews.title: Get Seresto instead
customer_reviews.text: I thought I might be able to save money since Seresto collars are so pricy, but after 2 weeks of my dog wearing this, I could still see fleas hopping around in her fur unaffected. The tin is cool for storage, but the collar is sheer garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M. Corral

customer_reviews.title: Not that effective.
customer_reviews.text: They work but not for a pure outside dog. The first one fell off the dog. The rubber is really soft and I think it came undone because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy Fix It

customer_reviews.title: No stars !!!
customer_reviews.text: These 2!collars did not work. We now have a flea infestation !!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I hope so
customer_reviews.text: Recieved product hope it works as easy as it was to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Scott

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay on dog. I have two on one dog and still doesn’t reply fleas Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Lwestbrook

customer_reviews.title: Cut to size
customer_reviews.text: Love the two for one price. The best part about the is I have two dogs that are two different sizes, the collars were huge all I had to do was cut to size
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Large and works but Clips are not great
customer_reviews.text: These work but they are not one-size-fits-all... I have to 10 lb Miniature Pinschers and these colors look humongous on them so we are not going to use them anymore. Also after we've put the Clips in place it seems to fall off their neck a lot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes they come off and then I just put a few stitches in it to keep the collar on
customer_reviews.author: Renee L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It hurt my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I have always kept flea collars on my dogs, but I will never use this one agian. My little chiwinnie had an allergic reaction that left her neck raw almost like chemical burns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: flea magnet
customer_reviews.text: Flea magnet. After 4 days on both my dogs I had to remove them. It seemed to attract the fleas. Many many many fleas arround neck, head and ears. Total ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase, they dont work.
customer_reviews.text: This flea collar does not work. I bathed my dogs with Adam's flea shampoo and put the collars on after they were dry. These collars did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Baker

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Very big. If you put it on and plan on taking it off for a bath have fun. It's so big. I didn't wanna put my dogs collar on and harness with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Great price - too bad the fleas are still around! Dogs continue to scratch and bite after a months use. Too bad I can't return....
customer_reviews.author: Daddio

customer_reviews.title: Only works for a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: This collar worked for a couple of weeks and took about a week and a half to start working. We put the collar on our dog at the beginning of April and last night May 8 I noticed he was scratching and he had a ton of fleas. They weren't newly hatched either most of the fleas were huge. I would recommend spending the money on the more expensive flea medicine than buying this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca124

customer_reviews.title: ... a pesticide resistant flea or what but I feel like after putting these on my dogs shouldn't sit and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if my dogs have a pesticide resistant flea or what but I feel like after putting these on my dogs shouldn't sit and scratch like crazy still.
customer_reviews.author: njep

product_meta.title: Adams Flea and Tick Collar for Dogs & Puppies 2 Pack
product_meta.description: The Adams Flea and Tick Collar for Dogs and Puppies kills adult fleas and ticks AND repels mosquitoes for up to 6 months. Two collars in each tin provide up to 12 months of flea and tick control. The collar features an extended-release technology that distributes the active ingredient over six months. The collar is a convenience over messy topical applications that release a high initial dose and last for just one month. Once the collar is applied, the active ingredient is transferred from the collar to your dog’s hair, and then to the skin. Adjustable, one-size collar fits all dogs. Water resistant!
feature_bullets: PROVEN EFFECTIVE: Flea and tick collar kills fleas and ticks, and repels mosquitoes, for up to 6 months.
LONG LASTING: Each collar provides up to 6 months' protection with extended release technology.
EXTRA VALUE: Two collars in each tin provide 12 months' protection total.
SO EASY: Flea, tick and mosquito prevention in one easy step without messy topicals.
ONE SIZE FITS ALL: Adjustable: One size fits all dogs. Just cut to size.
WATER RESISTANT: Remains effective after swimming or exposure to rain.
